<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// both be used interchangeably.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Write the section header table in the order specified in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SectionHdrLayout. SectionHdrLayout specifies the sections</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// order in which profile reader expect to read, so the section</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// header table should be written in the order in SectionHdrLayout.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that the section order in SecHdrTable may be different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from the order in SectionHdrLayout, for example, SecFuncOffsetTable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// needs to be computed after SecLBRProfile (the order in SecHdrTable),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but it needs to be read before SecLBRProfile (the order in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SectionHdrLayout). So we use IndexMap above to switch the order.</span></CodeLine>
